Description: The length of the statement  "            string serverName = Utils.ExtractServerNameFromConnectionString(ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["MongoDB"].ConnectionString); " is 132.

The following statement contains a magic number: if (hostIndex > 0)              {                  int endIndex = connectionString.IndexOf("/"' hostIndex + 2) + 1;                  if (endIndex > 0)                      return connectionString.Substring(0' endIndex);                  else                      return connectionString;              }

The following statement contains a magic number: if (hostIndex > 0)              {                  startIndex = connectionString.IndexOf("/"' hostIndex + 2) + 1;                  endIndex = connectionString.IndexOf("?"' startIndex);                  if (startIndex > 0)                  {                      if (endIndex > 0)                          return connectionString.Substring(startIndex' endIndex - startIndex);                      else                          return connectionString.Substring(startIndex);                  }              }
